widgets.title: Number of Code Repos by Project

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
FIND CodeRepo AS repo that (has|owns) (Project|Account) as p
        RETURN
        p.name as name,
        count(repo) AS value

widgets.title: PRs containing self-approved commits that merged last month

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
Find PR with
    approved=false and merged=true and updatedOn > date.now-30days as pr
return count(pr) as value

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
FIND Person AS p
  THAT IS User AS u
  THAT opened PR WITH state='OPEN' AS pr
RETURN
  p.displayName AS x,
  count(pr) AS y
ORDER BY y DESC
LIMIT 10

widgets.title: PRs containing commits from unvalidated developers last month

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find PR with
    validated=false and updatedOn > date.now-30days as pr
return count(pr) as value
